wordGroup: departure from 离开；违反，违背
departure time 出发时间；撤离时刻；起飞时刻
departure date 启程日期；离开日期
departure point 出发点；起程点；起航点
a new departure 新政策；新方针；新发展
departure lounge 候机室；启程处
port of departure 启运港；出发港
angle of departure 发射角；起飞角，离去角
airport of departure 始发站；始发站机场；启运机场

sentences.cn: 他神不知、鬼不觉地离开了。

sentences.en: It was a radical departure from tradition.
sentences.cn: 这从根本上违背了传统。

sentences.en: His departure, in fact, went almost unremarked.
sentences.cn: 事实上，他的离去几乎没被注意到。
